org.xbib.marc.dialects.pica

Class PicaXMLContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcContentHandler
      • org.xbib.marc.dialects.pica.PicaXMLContentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PicaConstants, MarcListener, MarcRecordListener, MarcXchangeConstants, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class PicaXMLContentHandler
extends MarcContentHandler
implements PicaConstants
    The Sax-ContentHandler-based Pica XML handler can handle SaX event input and fires events to a MarcXchange listener.
